name: youtube-summarizer-extension
description: Browser extension to summarize YouTube videos using Google's Gemini AI. Adds a button to YouTube pages that opens Gemini with the video URL for instant summaries.

scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: rimraf dist/chrome && mkdirp dist/chrome && npm run copy-files:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: rimraf dist/firefox && mkdirp dist/firefox && npm run copy-files:firefox
scripts.copy-files:chrome: copyfiles manifest.json content.js gemini_filler.js logging.js options.html options.js style.css images/* dist/chrome/
scripts.copy-files:firefox: copyfiles manifest.json content.js gemini_filler.js logging.js options.html options.js style.css images/* dist/firefox/
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.zip: npm run zip:chrome && npm run zip:firefox
